nodes.bodyText: This chunk is the actual feature. The rest is resolving the dependency hell from blackduck-common.

I think this exception is misleading, I don't think using the channel display name is clear enough.
We probably want something like this Please configure the 'Alert Issue Property Indexer' app for you server. That way they know exactly the name of the app to look for in the marketplace.
Good idea. This text predated the current PR. It was just moved to its own if.

Same issue as my previous comment. We probably want to update this message with the name of the App so they know what to look for in the installed apps, and if it isn't there then they know what to search for in the marketplace.
Existing issue but "Please verify the installation on you Jira Cloud server."  Should change to "Please verify the installation on your Jira Cloud server."
